title: Ep. 112 - The Nipple Ghost
description: Todd, Digs, Boston Connor, Nick, Zito, and Bailey all sit around the microphones to talk about hangover cures, marketing to babies, and hauntings. Todd tells a story about his friend getting dragged out a GLOW show, an all female space walk, and getting a small loan from Oprah. We hit I Wanna Know, a few of your Listener Questions, and the revitalized Heartland Movie Reviews with Netflix's Fractured.
dc:creator: The Pod
